item.title: No title
item.description: Quora.com The former Facebook CTO, Adam D’Angelo created Quora together with Charlie Cheever because “we thought that Q & A is one of those areas on the internet where there are a lot of sites, but no one had come along and built something that was really good yet.“. Their plan seems to have paid off. The comming years will tell if this business model turns out to be sustainable. Visibility in Google of the domain Quora.com They have very impressive URLs like https://www.quora.com/Can-I-burn-an-audio-CD-on-a-DVD-R-and-have-it-behave-as-a-CD-R-so-I-can-play-it-in-all-cars-and-players which themselves rank for almost 100 Keywords on Google:

item.title: 40 Most Important SEO Ranking Factors - Rank High In Google
item.description:
40 Most Important SEO Ranking Factors - Rank High In Google

So you want to rank higher in Google. You are not the only one. There are millions of websites competing with you for higher rankings and more organic traffic. To determine the quality and relevancy of a website, Google uses more than 200 metrics.
